snippet: By Saturday night, the families of the passengers aboard Malaysia Airlines Flight MH370 had few answers about what happened and dwindling hope that they would see their loved ones again.
abstract: Many families of passengers aboard Malaysia Airlines Flight MH370, which remains unaccounted for, have few answers about what happened and dwindling hope that they will see their loved ones again.

byline.contributor: Thomas Fuller contributed reporting from Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, and Chris Buckley from Hong Kong. Research was contributed by Susan Beachy in New York and Kunkun Yu in Beijing.

lead_paragraph: By Saturday night, the families of the passengers aboard Malaysia Airlines Flight MH370 had few answers about what happened and dwindling hope that they would see their loved ones again.

headline.main: For Families of Missing on Airliner, Memories Mix With Fading Hope
headline.print_headline: For Families, Memories Mix With Fading Hope
